root: ^Hello, sweet child. I am the dryad who protects this... incredibly small patch of land... don't stray too far, for you might fall off. I have a service I must ask of you.

c-0: ^You see that wand you hold in your hand? Use it to cleanse the spirits around the land (F on your keyboard).
c-1: ^I literally just told you I'm the dryad who protects this land. Were you not listening?
